type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, menace, first strike
[i]Hauteclere[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks, you gain 1 life.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Minerva, True Leader attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, create three 2/2 white Pegasus Knight creature tokens with flying.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Minerva deals combat damage to a player, create a 3/3 red Dragon Knight creature token with flying.
